languages.text: {n}Сперва металл на ощупь мало чем отличается от пластали. Но стоит слегка надавить, как он становится податливым и вязким, словно холодная смола. Там, где вы касаетесь его, на мгновение остаются светящиеся изумрудные следы, их заволакивает слоем черного металла.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Сперва вам кажется, что металл на ощупь не представляет из себя ничего особенного и мало чем отличается от пластали. Но стоит слегка надавить на него, как он становится податливым и вязким, словно холодная смола, липнущая к кончикам пальцев. Там, где вы касаетесь его, на мгновение остаются светящиеся изумрудные следы, после чего поверхность плиты заволакивает их слоем черного металла, не оставив даже воспоминания о том, что они когда-либо существовали.{/n}

languages.text: {n}At first, the metal feels not much different from plasteel to the touch. But as soon as you apply a little pressure, it becomes pliant and viscous like cold resin. Emerald-green marks linger for a moment where you touch it before being swallowed by the black metal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сперва металл на ощупь мало чем отличается от пластали. Но стоит слегка надавить, как он становится податливым и вязким, словно холодная смола. Там, где вы касаетесь его, на мгновение остаются светящиеся изумрудные следы, их заволакивает слоем черного металла.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}At first, the metal feels not much different from plasteel to the touch. But as soon as you apply a little pressure, it becomes pliant and viscous like cold resin. Emerald-green marks linger for a moment where you've touched it, before disappearing under a layer of black metal.{/n}

{n}At first, the metal feels not much different from plasteel to the touch. But as soon as you apply a little pressure, it becomes pliant and viscous like cold resin. Emerald-green marks linger for a moment where you've touched it, before disappearing under a layer of black metal.{/n}

{n}At first, the metal feels not much different from plasteel to the touch. But as soon as you apply a little pressure, it becomes pliant and viscous like cold resin. Emerald-green marks linger for a moment where you've touched it before being swallowed by the black metal.{/n},

{n}At first, the metal feels not much different from plasteel to the touch. But as soon as you apply a little pressure, it becomes pliant and viscous like cold resin. Emerald-green marks linger for a moment where you've touched it before being swallowed by the black metal.{/n},

{n}At first, the metal feels not much different from plasteel to the touch. But as soon as you apply a little pressure, it becomes pliant and viscous like cold resin. Emerald-green marks linger for a moment where you touch it before being swallowed by the black metal.{/n}

{n}At first, the metal feels not much different from plasteel to the touch. But as soon as you apply a little pressure, it becomes pliant and viscous like cold resin. Emerald-green marks linger for a moment where you touch it before being swallowed by the black metal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al principio, el metal no se diferencia mucho del plastiacero al tacto. Sin embargo, al aplicar un poco de presión, se vuelve maleable y viscoso como la resina fría. Unas marcas de color verde esmeralda quedan durante un momento donde tocas la losa antes de ser engullidas por el metal negro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first, the metal feels not much different from plasteel to the touch. But as soon as you apply a little pressure, it becomes pliant and viscous like cold resin. Emerald-green marks linger for a moment where you touch it before being swallowed by the black metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al principio, el metal no se diferencia mucho del plastiacero al tacto. Sin embargo, al aplicar un poco de presión, se vuelve maleable y viscoso como la resina fría. Unas marcas de color verde esmeralda quedan durante un momento donde has tocado la losa antes de ser engullidas por el metal negro.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dans un premier temps, la consistance du métal est semblable à celle du plastacier, mais dès que vous faites pression, il s'assouplit et devient aussi visqueux que de la résine froide. Des marques vert émeraude subsistent quelques instants à l'endroit où vous avez posé votre main, puis elles sont avalées par le métal noir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first, the metal feels not much different from plasteel to the touch. But as soon as you apply a little pressure, it becomes pliant and viscous like cold resin. Emerald-green marks linger for a moment where you touch it before being swallowed by the black metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans un premier temps, la consistance du métal est semblable à celle du plastacier, mais dès que vous faites pression, il s'assouplit et devient aussi visqueux que de la résine froide. Des marques vert émeraude subsistent quelques instants à l'endroit où vous avez posé votre main, puis elles sont avalées par le métal noir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}初めは、金属の感触はプラスチールとさほど変わらなかった。だが小さな圧力を加えるとすぐに、しなやかで粘性のある樹脂のように変化した。触れた場所にはしばらくエナメルグリーンの印が残っていたが、やがて黒い金属に吸い込まれた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first, the metal feels not much different from plasteel to the touch. But as soon as you apply a little pressure, it becomes pliant and viscous like cold resin. Emerald-green marks linger for a moment where you touch it before being swallowed by the black metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}初めは、金属の感触はプラスチールとさほど変わらなかった。だが小さな圧力を加えるとすぐに、しなやかで粘性のある樹脂のように変化した。触れた場所にはしばらくエナメルグリーンの印が残っていたが、やがて黒い金属に吸い込まれた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这种金属摸起来与塑钢似乎并没有太大区别，但只要你稍微施加一点压力，它就会变得柔软、粘稠，仿佛树脂一般。你触碰到的地方留下了翡翠色的痕迹，这些痕迹随后便陷入了黑色的金属之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first, the metal feels not much different from plasteel to the touch. But as soon as you apply a little pressure, it becomes pliant and viscous like cold resin. Emerald-green marks linger for a moment where you touch it before being swallowed by the black metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这种金属摸起来与塑钢似乎并没有太大区别，但只要你稍微施加一点压力，它就会变得柔软、粘稠，仿佛树脂一般。你触碰到的地方留下了翡翠色的痕迹，这些痕迹随后便陷入了黑色的金属之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zunächst fühlt sich das Metall kaum anders an als Plaststahl. Doch sobald du ein wenig Druck ausübst, wird es formbar und zähflüssig wie kaltes Harz. Smaragdgrüne Spuren verweilen einen Augenblick, wo du es berührt hast, bevor sie von dem schwarzen Metall verschluckt werden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first, the metal feels not much different from plasteel to the touch. But as soon as you apply a little pressure, it becomes pliant and viscous like cold resin. Emerald-green marks linger for a moment where you touch it before being swallowed by the black metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zunächst fühlt sich das Metall kaum anders an als Plaststahl. Doch sobald du ein wenig Druck ausübst, wird es formbar und zähflüssig wie kaltes Harz. Smaragdgrüne Spuren verweilen einen Augenblick, wo du es berührt hast, bevor sie von dem schwarzen Metall verschluckt werden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dokunduğun metal, ilk başta plasçelikten çok da farklı bir hissiyata sahip değil gibi geliyor. Ancak az miktarda baskı uyguladığında soğuk reçine gibi akışkan bir şekilde bükülüyor. Dokunduğun yerde bir anlığına zümrüdi yeşil işaretler beliriyor, sonrasında siyah metal tarafından yutuluyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first, the metal feels not much different from plasteel to the touch. But as soon as you apply a little pressure, it becomes pliant and viscous like cold resin. Emerald-green marks linger for a moment where you touch it before being swallowed by the black metal.{/n}
